title: [Self-Directed] Entrepreneurial Idea Generation Strategies for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Practical Experience in Diverse Industry Sectors and Basic Business Model Comprehension
context.additional_context: Blended education course in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, combining offline workshops with mobile learning platforms

learning_goals: Learners can generate drafts of five or more actionable startup ideas within four weeks.
Learners can explain idea generation strategies that leverage the diversity of functional experiences.
Learners can apply a framework for reinterpreting existing experiences using an exploratory learning mindset.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
